text: Matteo Brancaleoni (pronounced branka-leeonee) is an Italian contemporary pop/jazz singer, actor and journalist. ==Discography== === Albums === * Just Smile (2006) * Live in studio (2009) * New Life (2012) ===Independent albums=== * Merry Merry Christmas (2008) ===Live albums=== * Live! with Gianpaolo Petrini Big Band (2012) ===Compilation=== * Un Sanremese a Londra (2006) * Il Meglio di Zazzarazzaz (2007) * Jazz Magazine (n.49) (2007) ===DVDs=== * The Gianpaolo Petrini Big Band - Live from Collegno (2010) * Live! with Gianpaolo Petrini Big Band (2012) == Other websites == * Official Matteo Brancaleoni site * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Italian jazz musicians Category:Italian singers Category:Italian television actors
title: Matteo Brancaleoni
